emojis.name: Grinning Face
emojis.description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms.

emojis.name: Heart Eyes
emojis.description: A face with hearts instead of eyes, expressing love, infatuation, and adoration.

emojis.name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
emojis.description: A face lying on its side with tears of joy, laughing hysterically.

emojis.name: Thumbs Up
emojis.description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval, agreement, or encouragement.

emojis.name: Party Popper
emojis.description: A party popper with confetti and streamers being shot into the air in celebration.

emojis.name: Red Heart
emojis.description: A classic red heart, used to express love and affection.

emojis.name: Fire
emojis.description: A flame emoji often used to represent excitement, success, or something amazing.

emojis.name: Thinking Face
emojis.description: A face with a raised eyebrow and hand on chin, thinking deeply about something.

emojis.name: Pizza
emojis.description: A slice of pepperoni pizza with melted cheese and red sauce.

emojis.name: Rainbow
emojis.description: A colorful rainbow arc appearing after rain, symbol of hope and diversity.

emojis.name: Rocket
emojis.description: A rocket being launched into space, representing progress or success.

emojis.name: Clapping Hands
emojis.description: Two hands clapping, commonly used to express approval or applause.

emojis.name: Sparkles
emojis.description: Glittering, shining sparkles, often used to indicate something special or magical.

emojis.name: Face with Tears of Joy
emojis.description: A face with tears streaming down its cheeks, laughing intensely.

emojis.name: Unicorn
emojis.description: A mythical unicorn head, often representing something rare or special.

emojis.name: Crown
emojis.description: A golden crown with jewels, representing royalty or excellence.

emojis.name: Sunglasses
emojis.description: A face wearing sunglasses, expressing confidence or coolness.

emojis.name: Star
emojis.description: A classic gold star, often used for ratings or marking favorites.

emojis.name: Hundred Points
emojis.description: The number 100 in a red square, used to express perfection or approval.

emojis.name: Butterfly
emojis.description: A blue butterfly, symbolizing beauty, transformation, or freedom.
